sentence.Network_en: From day one he's been a great asset to the company.
sentence.Network_cn: 从入职第一天开始，他就是公司难得的人才。

sentence.Network_en: Her leadership qualities were the greatest asset of the Conservative Party.
sentence.Network_cn: 她的领导才能是保守党最宝贵的财富。

sentence.Network_en: His Republican credentials made him an asset.
sentence.Network_cn: 他作为共和党人的资历成了他的一笔财富。

derivation.yuyuan_name: mid 16th cent. (in the plural in the sense 'sufficient estate to allow discharge of a will'): from an Anglo-Norman French legal term, from Old French asez enough, based on Latin ad 'to' + satis 'enough'

encyclopedia.content: 英文名词，表示财产，资产、 (一项)财物，有价值的物品、宝贵的人材；有益的品质，才能；有利条件等意思。asset也是美国一家边界扫描公司的名字，其产品致力于尺寸小和使用方便的特点。

entry.def: Something or someone that is an asset is considered useful or helps a person or organization to be successful.

example.ex: Her leadership qualities were the greatest asset of the Conservative Party...
example.tran: 她的领导才能是保守党最宝贵的财富。

example.ex: His Republican credentials made him an asset.
example.tran: 他作为共和党人的资历成了他的一笔财富。

entry.def: The assets of a company or a person are all the things that they own.

example.ex: By the end of 1989 the group had assets of 3.5 billion francs.
example.tran: 到1989年底该集团拥有的资产达35亿法郎。

auth_sentence.content: He would be an asset to the new government.
auth_sentence.res_content: He would be an asset to the new government.

Sentence.sentence: Large companies have a difficult time switching into new markets because there is a temptation to put existing assets into the new businesses.
They find it costly to give up their existing assets
The big change is the availability of more data about people and things, which allows physical assets to be divided and consumed as services.
Young people no longer look upon skill as an important asset.
They sell stocks and other assets.
They suffer great losses in stocks, property and other assets

means.word_mean: 有价值的人或物; 优点, 长处

sentences.en: He is a great asset to our company.
sentences.cn: 他是我们公司的宝贵人才。

sentences.en: The bank has assets of more than ￡1 billion.
sentences.cn: 该银行有十亿多英镑的资产。

jushi.english: Her only asset was a gentle nature.
jushi.chinese: 她唯一的可贵之处是温文尔雅的性情。

jushi.english: The bank has assets of more than ￡1 billion.
jushi.chinese: 该银行有十亿多英镑的资产。

jushi.english: The festival is regarded as an asset for shopkeepers.
jushi.chinese: 节日被看作是商店老板发财的好机会。
